methods.name: test_serial_numbers_against_delivery_note
methods.docstring:
check if the sales invoice item serial numbers and the delivery note items
serial numbers are same

methods.name: test_outstanding_amount_after_advance_payment_entry_cancellation
methods.docstring: Test impact of advance PE submission/cancellation on SI and SO.

methods.name: test_inter_company_transaction_without_default_warehouse
methods.docstring: Check mapping (expense account) of inter company SI to PI in absence of default warehouse.

methods.name: test_asset_depreciation_on_sale_with_pro_rata
methods.docstring: Tests if an Asset set to depreciate yearly on June 30, that gets sold on Sept 30, creates an additional depreciation entry on its date of sale.

methods.name: test_asset_depreciation_on_sale_without_pro_rata
methods.docstring: Tests if an Asset set to depreciate yearly on Dec 31, that gets sold on Dec 31 after two years, created an additional depreciation entry on its date of sale.

methods.name: test_over_billing_case_against_delivery_note
methods.docstring:
Test a case where duplicating the item with qty = 1 in the invoice
allows overbilling even if it is disabled

methods.name: set_pos_fields
methods.docstring: Set retail related fields from POS Profiles

methods.name: set_against_income_account
methods.docstring: Set against account for debit to account

methods.name: so_dn_required
methods.docstring: check in manage account if sales order / delivery note required or not.

methods.name: validate_proj_cust
methods.docstring: check for does customer belong to same project as entered..

methods.name: validate_delivery_note
methods.docstring: If items are linked with a delivery note, stock cannot be updated again.

methods.name: validate_dropship_item
methods.docstring: If items are drop shipped, stock cannot be updated.

methods.name: depreciate_asset_on_sale
methods.docstring: Depreciate asset on sale or cancellation of return sales invoice

methods.name: restore_asset
methods.docstring: Restore asset on return or cancellation of original sales invoice

methods.name: update_asset
methods.docstring: Update asset status, disposal date and asset activity on sale or return sales invoice

sales_invoice/sales_invoice.py.docstring: sets applicable loyalty program to the customer or returns a list of applicable programs
